thread.title: Woman stuck in bathtub after putting in too much coconut oil (5 photos)
thread.title_full: Woman stuck in bathtub after putting in too much coconut oil (5 photos)

author: Alex
title: Woman stuck in bathtub after putting in too much coconut oil (5 photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
A woman found herself trapped in the tub after mixing a generous amount of coconut oil into her bath. 
When she drained the water, the coconut oil stuck to the tub. making it impossible for her to climb out. She took to Imgur for help, saying that every time she tried to get up, she would “just slide around like a giant greased up potato in a roasting dish.” 
Here’s her SOS: 
Here is a funny and current story. I am stuck in a bath. I can’t actually get out of my bath tub. Why? 
I’ve go a chest infection and some fever so I’m home sick. I also can’t turn my head. Took some antibiotics and a Valium and thought- i will have a relaxing bath. I found some bath salts. Lit some candles and poured in some coconut oil- now I am realising it was too much coconut oil. Went to get out after pulling the plug and I just slide around like a giant greased up potato in a roasting dish. There is no traction. No grip. Just me and my fat body slipping around covered in oil. Fuck home beauty remedies. SOS 2 
The internet responded with a couple ideas: 3 
And it looks like she finally got herself out: 4
